about_the_game:
ANOTHER DAY DLC

The Another Day DLC is contains new content for GESTALT: The Fifth Day. This content includes:

  • A post-game story, titled, "Another Day," taking place after achieving Ending II.

  • 3 New Scenarios, added across Days 2, 3, and 4.

  • 7 new achievements.

  • 2 New secret codes.

  • Updated assets and gameplay mechanics.

  • Updated and additional dialogue.

  • Many, many more secrets.

ANOTHER DAY: A POST-GAME STORY

Wickeina "Wicke" Gestalt still lives in a haunted house.

While Wicke has achieved a tighter grasp on the strange phenomenon in her home since the events of GESTALT: The Fifth Day's main story, the bizarre entities that live with her still appear day by day. This day, a strange creature called the "Ogre" has appeared in the house, and Wicke must figure out how to appease it and make it disappear. However, in doing so, Wicke is met with the many mysteries of the home's previous owner, Agatha "Old Aggie" MacDonald, and her connection to the strange Ogre.

NEW SCENARIOS

BUTCHER

Wicke comes home from a strange encounter, only to quickly learn that she's not alone. An entity that's well-known to her is hunting her in the house, forcing her to hide in various room to avoid further harm.

GNOMES

Wicke finally decides to deal with the garden gnomes, a group entity that wards other deadly entities from the house, at the cost of occasionally eating stray animals and outdoor pets that cross their path.

DUNGEON

Wicke finds a strange computer game on her laptop that she definitely doesn't remember installing herself. Playing the strange game, Wicke tries to figure out how it works, and what it is trying to tell her.

... AND MUCH MORE!

More features, codes, and secrets lie ahead in this seemingly package. To find out more, explore the Another Day DLC for yourself!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains themes of depression and suicidal ideation, and contains psychological horror, body horror, and other disturbing imagery. Viewer discretion is advised.

short_description: Explore more scenarios, experience more stories, and uncover more secrets in the point-and-click psychological horror, GESTALT: The Fifth Day's Another Day DLC!
